brand_identity.name: Wanbyukhan Holdings, LLC
brand_identity.description: An Internet Businesses Holding Company building the digital infrastructure of tomorrow.
brand_identity.emotional_tone: Legitimate, Trustworthy, Calm, Reserved, Minimalist Luxury
brand_identity.target_audience: Apple Developer Program reviewers, corporate stakeholders, potential partners

usage_rules.headings: Use 'Playfair Display' for all H1-H3. Keep weights moderate (400-500). Avoid bold weights for a refined look.
usage_rules.body: Use 'Manrope' for all paragraphs and UI elements. Ensure high readability with relaxed line-height.
usage_rules.buttons: Use 'Manrope' Medium or SemiBold. Uppercase tracking-widest for refined buttons.
usage_rules.color_pairing: Headings in Dark Charcoal (#1A1A1A), Body in Muted Charcoal (#4A4A4A).

semantic_usage.page_bg: Use bg-[#FAF8F5] for the main page background.
semantic_usage.text_muted: Use text-[#595959] for body text and secondary information.
semantic_usage.accent_elements: Use Sage Green (#8DA399) for primary buttons and active states.
semantic_usage.borders: Use subtle warm grey borders (#DddBd5) for separation.

layout_grid.grid_system: Use CSS Grid with 'gap-8' or 'gap-12' for layout separation. Avoid dense packing.

visual_enhancers.texture: Add a subtle noise texture overlay (opacity 0.03) to the background to prevent 'digital flatness'.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use soft, warm shadows: 'shadow-[0_4px_20px_-2px_rgba(26,26,26,0.05)]'. Avoid harsh black shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 1px solid borders with low opacity (border-primary/10) for cards to give structure without weight.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use 'backdrop-blur-md bg-white/50' for sticky headers or floating elements.
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-none for a strict corporate look, or rounded-sm (2px) for slight softening. Do NOT use large rounded corners.

buttons.primary: bg-[#8DA399] text-white hover:bg-[#7A8F85] rounded-sm px-8 py-3 transition-all duration-300 font-medium tracking-wide shadow-sm
buttons.outline: border border-[#1A1A1A] text-[#1A1A1A] hover:bg-[#1A1A1A] hover:text-white rounded-sm px-8 py-3 transition-all duration-300
buttons.link: text-[#1A1A1A] underline decoration-1 underline-offset-4 hover:text-[#8DA399] transition-colors

cards.style: bg-white border border-[#E6E4DE] p-8 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-300 rounded-sm

inputs.style: bg-transparent border-b border-[#DddBd5] focus:border-[#8DA399] rounded-none px-0 py-3 transition-colors outline-none text-[#1A1A1A] placeholder:text-muted-foreground/60

focus_areas.title: Strategic Private Investments
focus_areas.alt: Clock on wall representing long-term vision

sections: Hero: Left aligned text (H1, Subtitle, CTA), Right aligned large image. 50/50 split.
About: Centered text block. 'Mission Statement'. max-w-3xl mx-auto.
Focus Areas: 3-column grid. Each card has Icon/Image + Title + Short Desc.
Contact: Two columns. Left: Contact Info (Email, Address). Right: Visual Form (Name, Email, Message, Submit).

footer.content: Copyright text, Privacy Policy Link, Terms of Use Link. Simple, minimalist, top border.

privacy.structure: Simple text document layout. H1 Title, Last Updated Date, Prose content.

terms.structure: Simple text document layout. H1 Title, Last Updated Date, Prose content.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Playfair Display' from Google Fonts via 'next/font' or standard CSS import.
Update 'tailwind.config.js' with the custom colors provided in the 'colors' section.
Ensure the 'Contact' form is VISUAL ONLY. No backend integration needed.
Create the 'Privacy Policy' and 'Terms of Use' pages with placeholder legal text.
Use a text-based favicon 'W' using a simple SVG or canvas generation.
Ensure mobile responsiveness: Stack the Hero section (Image top or bottom depending on flow), stack the Focus Areas to 1 col.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES: Do NOT use gradients. Stick to solid colors.
Do NOT use standard 'Shadcn' card styles. Use the custom 'cards.style' defined above.
Ensure ample whitespace. Use 'py-20' or 'py-24' for section padding.
Typography is the hero. Ensure proper line-height and letter-spacing.
